verses.verse: Jude <WG2455>, a servant <WG1401> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>, and <WG1161> brother <WG80> of James <WG2385>, to them that are called <WG2822>, beloved <WG37> in <WG1722> God <WG2316> the Father <WG3962>, and <WG2532> kept <WG5083> for Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>:
Mercy <WG1656> unto you <WG5213> and <WG2532> peace <WG1515> and <WG2532> love <WG26> be multiplied <WG4129>.

Beloved <WG27>, while I was giving <WG4160> all <WG3956> diligence <WG4710> to write <WG1125> unto you <WG5213> of <WG4012> our common <WG2839> salvation <WG4991>, I <WG2192> was <WG2192> constrained <WG318> to write <WG1125> unto you <WG5213> exhorting <WG3870> you to contend <WG1864> earnestly for the faith <WG4102> which was <WG3860> once <WG530> for all delivered <WG3860> unto the saints <WG40>.

For <WG1063> there are <WG3921> certain <WG5100> men <WG444> crept in privily <WG3921>, even they who were <WG4270> of old <WG3819> written <WG4270> of beforehand unto <WG1519> this <WG5124> condemnation <WG2917>, ungodly men <WG765>, turning <WG3346> the grace <WG5485> of <WG2316> our <WG2257> God <WG2316> into <WG1519> lasciviousness <WG766>, and <WG2532> denying <WG720> our <WG2316> only <WG3441> Master1203, 2316 and2532, 2257 Lord <WG1203>, Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>.

Now I desire <WG1014> to <WG1161> put <WG5279> you <WG5209> in remembrance <WG5279>, though <WG1492> ye <WG5209> know <WG1492> all things <WG5124> once <WG530> for all <WG3754>, that the Lord <WG2962>, having saved <WG4982> a people <WG2992> out of <WG1537> the land <WG1093> of Egypt <WG125>, afterward <WG1208> destroyed <WG622> them that believed <WG4100> not <WG3361>.

And <WG5037> angels <WG32> that kept <WG5083> not <WG3361> their <WG1438> own principality <WG746>, but <WG235> left <WG620> their proper <WG2398> habitation <WG3613>, he hath kept <WG5083> in <WG1199> everlasting <WG126> bonds <WG1199> under <WG5259> darkness <WG2217> unto <WG1519> the judgment <WG2920> of the <WG2250> great <WG3173> day <WG2250>.

Even as <WG5613> Sodom <WG4670> and <WG2532> Gomorrah <WG1116>, and <WG2532> the cities <WG4172> about <WG4012> them <WG846>, having in <WG5158> like3664, 5125 manner <WG5158> with these given themselves over to fornication <WG1608> and <WG2532> gone <WG565> after <WG3694> strange <WG2087> flesh <WG4561>, are set forth <WG4295> as an example <WG1164>, suffering <WG5254> the punishment <WG1349> of <WG4442> eternal <WG166> fire <WG4442>.

Yet in like <WG3668> manner these <WG3778> also <WG2532> in their dreamings <WG1797> defile <WG3392> the flesh <WG4561>, and <WG1161> set at nought dominion <WG2963>, and <WG1161> rail <WG987> at dignities <WG1161>.

But <WG1161> Michael <WG3413> the archangel <WG743>, when <WG3753> contending <WG1252> with the devil <WG1228> he disputed <WG1256> about <WG4012> the body <WG4983> of Moses <WG3475>, durst <WG5111> not <WG3756> bring against him <WG2018> a <WG2920> railing <WG988> judgment <WG2920>, but <WG235> said <WG2036>, The Lord <WG2962> rebuke <WG2008> thee <WG4671>.

But <WG3303> these <WG3778> rail <WG987> at whatsoever <WG3745> things they know <WG1492> not <WG3756>: and <WG1161> what <WG3745> they understand <WG1987> naturally <WG5447>, like <WG5613> the creatures <WG2226> without reason <WG249>, in <WG1722> these things <WG5125> are they destroyed <WG1161>.

Woe <WG3759> unto them <WG846>! For <WG3754> they went <WG4198> in the way <WG3598> of Cain <WG2535>, and <WG2532> ran riotously <WG1632> in the error <WG4106> of Balaam <WG903> for hire <WG3408>, and <WG2532> perished <WG622> in the gainsaying <WG485> of Korah <WG2879>.

These <WG3778> are <WG1526> they who are hidden rocks <WG4694> in <WG1722> your <WG5216> love-feasts <WG26> when they feast with <WG4910> you <WG5213>, shepherds that without fear <WG870> feed <WG4165> themselves <WG1438>; clouds <WG3507> without water <WG504>, carried along <WG4064> by <WG5259> winds <WG417>; autumn <WG5352> leaves <WG1186> without fruit <WG175>, twice <WG1364> dead <WG599>, plucked up by the roots <WG1610>;

Wild <WG66> waves <WG2949> of the sea <WG2281>, foaming out <WG1890> their own <WG1438> shame <WG152>; wandering <WG4107> stars <WG792>, for whom <WG3739> the blackness <WG2217> of darkness <WG4655> hath been reserved <WG5083> for <WG1519> ever <WG165>.

And <WG1161> to these <WG5125> also <WG2532> Enoch <WG1802>, the seventh <WG1442> from <WG575> Adam <WG76>, prophesied <WG4395>, saying <WG3004>, Behold <WG2400>, the Lord <WG2962> came <WG2064> with <WG1722> ten thousands <WG3461> of <WG40> his <WG846> holy ones <WG40>,

to execute <WG4160> judgment <WG2920> upon <WG2596> all <WG3956>, and <WG2532> to convict <WG1827> all <WG3956> the ungodly <WG765> of <WG4012> all <WG3956> their <WG846> works <WG2041> of <WG4012> ungodliness <WG763> which <WG3739> they have ungodly wrought <WG764>, and <WG2532> of <WG4012> all <WG3956> the hard <WG4642> things which <WG3739> ungodly <WG765> sinners <WG268> have spoken <WG2980> against <WG2596> him <WG846>.

These <WG3778> are <WG1526> murmurers <WG1113>, complainers <WG3202>, walking <WG4198> after <WG2596> their lusts <WG1939> (and <WG2532> their <WG846> mouth <WG4750> speaketh <WG2980> great swelling <WG5246> words <WG2296>), showing respect <WG2296> of <WG5484> persons <WG4383> for the sake of <WG5484> advantage <WG5622>.

But <WG1161> ye <WG5210>, beloved <WG27>, remember <WG3415> ye the words <WG4487> which have been spoken before <WG4280> by <WG5259> the apostles <WG652> of <WG5259> our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>;

That <WG3754> they said <WG3004> to you <WG5213>, In <WG1722> the <WG5550> last <WG2078> time <WG5550> there shall be <WG2071> mockers <WG1703>, walking <WG4198> after <WG2596> their own <WG1438> ungodly <WG763> lusts <WG3754>.
These <WG3778> are <WG1526> they who <WG1438> make separations <WG592>, sensual <WG5591>, having <WG2192> not <WG3361> the Spirit <WG4151>.

But <WG1161> ye <WG5210>, beloved <WG27>, building up <WG2026> yourselves <WG1438> on <WG4102> your <WG5216> most holy <WG40> faith <WG4102>, praying <WG4336> in <WG1722> the <WG4151> Holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151>,

keep <WG5083> yourselves <WG1438> in <WG1722> the love <WG26> of God <WG2316>, looking for <WG4327> the mercy <WG1656> of <WG2962> our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> unto <WG1519> eternal <WG166> life <WG2222>.
And <WG2532> on some <WG3739> have mercy <WG1653>, who are in doubt <WG3303>;

and <WG1161> some <WG3739> save <WG4982>, snatching <WG726> them out of <WG1537> the fire <WG4442>; and on some have mercy with <WG1722> fear <WG5401>; hating <WG3404> even <WG2532> the garment <WG5509> spotted <WG4695> by <WG575> the flesh <WG4561>.

Now <WG1161> unto him that is able <WG1410> to guard <WG5442> you <WG5209> from stumbling <WG679>, and <WG2532> to set <WG2476> you before the presence <WG2714> of <WG1391> his <WG846> glory <WG1391> without blemish <WG299> in <WG1722> exceeding joy <WG20>,

to the <WG2316> only3441, 4680 God <WG2316> our <WG2257> Saviour <WG4990>, through Jesus Christ our <WG2257> Lord <WG1391>, be glory, majesty <WG3172>, dominion <WG2904> and <WG2532> power <WG1849>, before all time <WG2532>, and now <WG3568>, and <WG2532> for evermore <WG3956>. Amen <WG281>.
